MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:58pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair works required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:52pm on Sunday, 01 November 2020
